announcement.title: Server Internal Documentation
announcement.subtitle: Complete API reference verified against source code

metadata.title: HytaleDocs
metadata.description: Community documentation for Hytale. Gameplay, modding, servers and API reference guides.

hero.subtitle: The community documentation for Hytale
hero.description: Gameplay guides, modding, server administration and API reference.
hero.descriptionLine2: Everything you need to master Hytale.

navCards.title: EXPLORE THE WIKI
navCards.subtitle: Find everything you need to start developing for Hytale
navCards.moddingDesc: Create custom blocks, items, NPCs, and more. Learn the fundamentals of Hytale modding.
navCards.serversDesc: Set up, configure, and manage Hytale game servers. From basic setup to advanced administration.
navCards.apiDesc: Explore the official Hytale API. Authentication, endpoints, and SDK documentation.
navCards.toolsDesc: Master Blockbench, the Asset Editor, and other essential development tools.
navCards.guidesDesc: Step-by-step tutorials to help you create your first block, item, NPC, and more.
navCards.communityDesc: Join the community, contribute to the wiki, and connect with other developers.

updates.title: LATEST UPDATES
updates.subtitle: Recent additions and changes to the documentation
updates.serverInternalsDesc: Technical v1 documentation of the Hytale server - Plugins, Events, ECS, Packets and more
updates.serverCalculatorDesc: Calculate recommended RAM, CPU and storage for your server
updates.projectGeneratorDesc: Generate a complete plugin or mod project structure
updates.jsonValidatorDesc: Validate your JSON files against Hytale schemas

community.title: JOIN THE COMMUNITY
community.subtitle: Connect with other Hytale developers and contribute to the project
community.discordDesc: Join our Discord server to chat with other developers
community.githubDesc: Contribute to the wiki and explore the source code
community.ctaText: Want to contribute to the wiki?

footer.description: Community documentation for Hytale. Guides, tutorials and references for players and developers.
footer.copyright: HytaleDocs. Not affiliated with Hypixel Studios.

tools.title: Developer Tools
tools.subtitle: Interactive tools to help you develop Hytale mods, plugins, and servers.
tools.serverCalculatorDesc: Calculate recommended RAM, CPU, and storage based on player count and view distance
tools.projectGeneratorDesc: Generate plugin or mod project structure with correct folder layout and starter files
tools.jsonValidatorDesc: Validate your blocks, items, NPCs, and manifest.json files against Hytale schemas
tools.basedOnOfficialDesc: These tools are built using information from official Hytale blog posts and documentation. Requirements and specifications may change as the game evolves.

serverCalculator.title: Server Requirements Calculator
serverCalculator.subtitle: Estimate the hardware requirements for your Hytale server based on player count and view distance.
serverCalculator.serverConfigDesc: Adjust the sliders to match your expected server load
serverCalculator.viewDistanceNote: Doubling view distance quadruples server load

projectGenerator.title: Project Generator
projectGenerator.subtitle: Generate a project structure for your Hytale plugin or mod with all the necessary files.
projectGenerator.author: Author

jsonValidator.title: JSON Validator
jsonValidator.subtitle: Validate your Hytale JSON files against expected schemas.
jsonValidator.blockDesc: Block definition JSON for custom blocks
jsonValidator.itemDesc: Item definition JSON for custom items
jsonValidator.clickToValidate: Click Validate to check your JSON
jsonValidator.aboutDesc: This validator checks your JSON against schemas based on official Hytale documentation. Note that Hytale is in Early Access and schemas may change. Always test your content in-game.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

adblock.title: Support HytaleDocs
adblock.message: We noticed you're using an ad blocker. Ads help us keep this documentation free and updated. Consider disabling it for our site!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: HytaleDocs ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website hytale-docs.com.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information to provide and improve our services:
dataCollection.item1: Usage data (pages visited, time spent, browser type)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function properly
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services:
thirdParty.adsense: Google AdSense displays advertisements. Google may use cookies to personalize ads based on your browsing history.
thirdParty.analytics: Privacy-focused analytics to understand site usage without tracking personal data.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent banner.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

docProgress.title: Documentation in Progress
docProgress.dialogDescription: We are actively working on completing the documentation. Some sections may be incomplete or missing.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using HytaleDocs, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website.

use.title: Use of Content
use.content: The content on HytaleDocs is provided for informational and educational purposes. You may use the documentation for personal and commercial projects related to Hytale development.

content.title: User Contributions
content.content: If you contribute content to HytaleDocs, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify, and distribute your contributions as part of the documentation.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: HytaleDocs is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information. Hytale is in Early Access and specifications may change.

affiliation.title: No Affiliation
affiliation.content: HytaleDocs is a community project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to Hypixel Studios or Riot Games. Hytale is a trademark of Hypixel Studios.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
